UnnecessaryLocalBeforeReturn.description:
Description

Deprecated

Avoid the creation of unnecessary local variables.

This rule has been deprecated since 7.17.0. Use the new ruleVariableCanBeInlinedinstead, which additionally covers throw statements.

Example(s):

Use this rule with the default properties by just referencing it:

Use this rule and customize it:
UnnecessaryLocalBeforeReturn.option:
Name	Default Value	Description
statementOrderMatters	true	If set to false this rule no longer requires the variable declaration and return statement to be on consecutive lines. Any variable that is used solely in a return statement will be reported.
